intro.dialog: У меня есть кое-что, что я хочу показать.
Я изменила |C3|Подземелье Погибели и Плача|C0| и создала свою игру!

talk_blank.dialog: Самый эффективный метод объяснить - рассказать, за кого ты будешь играть.
Твоя задача - победить |C3|Лордов Демонов|C0|, захвативших лес.
Поэтому тебе надо сначала украсть их сокровища.
С демонические сокровищами ты сможешь сразиться с ними!
Необходимо будет выбрать наилучшее время для атаки!

talk_defect.dialog: Задача - победить |C3|Лордов Демонов|C0|, что захватили лес.
Значит, мне надо драться с кем-то?
Я знала, что тебе лучше всего подойдёт класс |C3|Пустоблюдательницы|C0|!
Пустоблюдательницы начинают с чуть более сильными атаками и |C3|лечатся каждый раз, когда побеждают врага!|C0|
Не надо сразу лезть в драку с Лордом Демонов.
Самая эффективная стратегия - сначала собрать сокровища, чтобы стать сильнее.

talk_twins.dialog: Я думаю, наилучший метод объяснить - сначала рассказать вам обеим ваши роли.
Я думаю, класс Мага Солнца тебе подойдёт.
Маги |C3|снимает ослабление|C0|, когда совершают критическую атаку!
Ослабления усложняют попадания по врагам, заполняя |C3|полосу действий|C0| промахами и вызывающими контрудар атаками.
Наверное, это был не самый эффективный метод объяснить игру.
Твоя сестра будет принадлежать к классу |C3|Ангелов|C0|.
Ангелы лечат лучше, чем другие герои поддержки!
Не знала, что есть такие ленивые ангелы.

talk_devil.dialog: Задача - победить |C3|Лордов Демонов|C0|, что захватили лес.
Лорды Демонов думают, что могут справиться с Дьяволом?
Она |C3|усиляет атаку|C0| за каждого побеждённого врага!
Но этот бонус пропадает после каждой битвы.
Зверь не понаслышке знаком с мошем.
Лорды Демонов почувствуют праведный гнев    Зверя!

to_first_round.dialog: История начинается давным-давно в древнем лесу.
В нём всегда царил мир и росли очень большие грибы!
Но однажды |C3|Лорды Демонов|C0| вторглись и захватили лес!
Тогда |C3|[VAL1]|C0| и |C3|[VAL2]|C0| отправились в поход, чтобы победить |C3|Лордов Демонов|C0| и спасти лес.
Но сперва им придётся украсть сокровища демонов, чтобы усилиться.
Вы заходите в лес в поисках подобных сокровищ.

to_next_round.dialog_rand2: What is |C3|[VAL1]|C0| planning to do next?
to_next_round.dialog_rand3: What is the most efficient next step?
to_next_round.dialog_rand4: You must now decide what to do next.
to_next_round.dialog_rand5: Now our heroes must decide what to do next.
to_next_round.dialog_rand6: Our heroes take a short break as they decide what to do next.
to_next_round.dialog_rand7: What will our heroes do next?
to_next_round.dialog_rand8: |C3|[VAL1]|C0| takes a moment to plan the optimal path.
to_next_round.dialog_rand9: Our heroes contemplate the most efficient path forward.

battle_mix1: You are attacked by various demon minions!
battle_mix2: A mixed group of demon minions attacks you!
battle_mites: A nest of demon possessed mites ambushes you!
battle_aviocs: A flock of demon possessed aviocs swoops down on you!
battle_stones: A pod of heart stones activate attack mode!
battle_dancers: A group of demon possessed dancers encircle you!
battle_scrambles: A gang of demon scrambles surrounds you!
battle_voidlings: A soup of voidlings rains down upon you!

start_battle.dialog_rand1: You find a treasure chest sitting out in the open, but as you lift the lid open-
start_battle.dialog_rand2: You find something shiny in a tree, but as you reach out for it-
start_battle.dialog_rand3: As you are walking through the forest, |C3|[VAL2]|C0| suddenly yells at you to turn around.
start_battle.dialog_rand4: You accidentally trip and fall into a hole. You happen to find a piece of treasure in here, but when you look up-
start_battle.dialog_rand5: That night, as you are sleeping by the fire, a noise suddenly wakes you.
start_battle.dialog_rand6: You find the ruins of a fallen tower, but as you enter it-
start_battle.dialog_rand7: You decide to search for treasure in a dark cave, but as you enter-
start_battle.dialog_rand8: You find a scrapyard and decide to search it for treasure.
start_battle.dialog_rand9: You find a forest dungeon and decide to search it for treasure.

start_demonlord_first.dialog: The heroes encounter the first Demonlord!

start_battle_teeth.dialog: It's the |C3|Demon of Teeth|C0| with her mob of |C3|Scrambles!|C0|
She likes to trick her victims into giving her a toothy hug.

start_battle_fury.dialog: It's the |C3|Demon of Fury|C0| with her mob of |C3|Boils!|C0|
|C3|Boils|C0| are weak, but they also give the next enemy a turn!

start_battle_maiden.dialog: Run to the hills!|L|The |C3|Iron Maiden|C0| emerges from the ground beneath you!
She can swim through the ground by turning it into lava.

start_battle_engine.dialog: The |C3|Chaos Engine|C0| emerges from her tower!
She is followed by a |C3|Chaos Construct|C0| that she has constructed in her image.

start_battle_avenger.dialog: The mechanical demonlord, |C3|Avenger 7X,|C0| appears before you!
Her army of |C3|Sync Units|C0| will prioritize healing her and increasing her defenses.

start_battle_voidmass.dialog: Drops of pure void begin to rain down upon you.
The drops collect together to form the |C3|Void Mass|C0| right before you!

comment_turn_support.dialog: |C3|[VAL2]|C0| can heal |C3|[VAL1]|C0| or give her a power boost.

to_battle_small_loot.dialog: These minions were only guarding a tiny treasure chest.

to_battle_medium_loot.dialog: These minions were guarding a demon treasure chest!

to_battle_large_loot.dialog: These minions were guarding a |wave|huge demon treasure chest!

to_boss_medium_loot.dialog: You also claim this Demonlord's treasure chest!

to_boss_large_loot.dialog: You also claim this Demonlord's |wave|huge demon treasure chest!

battle_lose.dialog: You managed to escape just in time!
|C3|[VAL1]|C0| and |C3|[VAL2]|C0| retreat from the forest for the night.
They fully recovered after a night of rest.
Then they returned to the forest the next morning!

start_course.dialog_rand1: You decide to search the forest for treasure.
start_course.dialog_rand2: You see an unguarded demon treasure just ahead of you.
start_course.dialog_rand3: As you walk through the forest, you see a treasure in a small cave ahead of you.
start_course.dialog_rand4: You find a treasure chest sitting out in the open. All you have to do is reach it.

start_scavenge.dialog_rand1: You decide to search for treasure in a dark cave. Luckily, there were no minions inside.
start_scavenge.dialog_rand2: You find the ruins of a fallen tower, and you decide to scavenge it for treasure.
start_scavenge.dialog_rand3: You find a scrapyard with no demon minions around. You decide to search it for treasure.
start_scavenge.dialog_rand4: You find a forest dungeon, and you decide to scavenge it for treasure. Luckily, there were no minions inside.

to_find_small_loot.dialog: You found a tiny treasure chest!

to_find_medium_loot.dialog: You found a demon treasure chest!

to_find_large_loot.dialog: You found a |wave|huge demon treasure chest!

comment_choose_rewards.dialog: You can |C3|take [VAL1] cards|C0| from this treasure chest.

timed_out.dialog: |C3|[VAL2]|C0| noticed a massive group of demon minions approaching!
Our heroes decide that the optimal strategy was to retreat for the day.

you_win_but_times_up.dialog: It's getting pretty late, don't you think?
We can always continue the game tomorrow!

you_win_and_max_mood.dialog: You already made it through everything I planned out so far!
I'll have to make the other Demonlords even worse!

times_up.dialog: That's enough of my game for today.

times_up_defect.dialog: That's enough of my game for today.
It's just for pretend, My Defect.
Sorry, I got carried away there.
I didn't expect you to like my game so much!

to_gift.dialog: I've prepared some prizes for you!

comment_take_unknown.dialog: Did I put this here? What is it?

leave_confirm.dialog: You want me to keep them?

to_another_gift.dialog: That is certainly the optimal choice!
Your reward will have to be another gift!

to_last_gift.dialog: You are the ideal gift receiver!
I guess I'll have to give you one more.

to_the_end.dialog: Gifts are such an efficient way to express love!

sleep_response.dialog: I haven't slept in 4 days while working on this game anyways.
You don't mind if I sleep next to you, right?

leave_blank.dialog: Did you draw all the little characters?
No, not me. It was my friend, Kiwi!
|wave|I love Kiwi!|!||L|And I love you, too!

leave_defect.dialog: You saw my claws, right?|L|They just do that sometimes.
It happens when I get too excited.
I knew I picked the right character for you.

leave_twins.dialog: Maybe next time, you can introduce a character that wants to romance |C3|The Mage.|C0|
|C3|The Dryad|C0| is another one of my characters, and she would be interested.
But I'm going to be really bad at acting out that kind of thing.

leave_devil.dialog: They'll be singing songs about our righteous campaign!
I'll have to write an epic about our heroes and their battles with the Demonlords.
It shall be called,    The Beast and the Dryad!
I can't wait to hear it!

leave_default.dialog: Thank you for playing with me!
